item.title: How do i add dragon defender into my server?
item.dc:creator: @mr_h33lz mr h33lz.
item.description:
@mr_h33lz wrote:

how do u putif(i == ****) {//item id
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924;//924 should be dragon texture
class8.anInt181 = 490;
class8.anInt190 = 344;
class8.anInt198 = 192;
class8.anInt204 = 138;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 20;
class8.anInt175 = 56;
class8.anInt197 = 116;
class8.anInt174 = ****;//ground model
class8.anInt165 = ****;//wear
class8.anInt200 = ****;//wear
class8.aString170 = “Dragon defender”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A defensive weapon.”.getBytes();
} in to sheilds make’s no sence… [quote=“madgamer, post:10, topic:182000”]shields maybe?[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 05:41:45 PM[/size][hr]anyone please help!!!
